results.title: A resolution expressing support for the designation of May 1, 2017, as "Silver Star Service Banner Day".
results.short_title: A resolution expressing support for the designation of May 1, 2017, as "Silver Star Service Banner Day".
results.latest_major_action: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.
results.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)  Expresses support for the designation of May 1, 2017, as Silver Star Service Banner Day.
results.summary_short: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)  Expresses support for the designation of May 1, 2017, as Silver Star Service Banner Day.

actions.description: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.
Senate Committee on Armed Services discharged by Unanimous Consent. (consideration: CR S2653)
